eventDescription.eventDescription:
"I'm a holistic assassin... I kill whoever I feel like killing all day and if I killed them, they were my target."

Ken: "Oh my God, oh my God... Did you just dodge a bullet?"
Bart: "No... Bullet dodged me. I can't be hurt, Universe won't allow it. Only constants are me and gravity. I'm special that way." 
Ken: "Insane... You said you kill whoever you meet..."
Bart: "That's right"
Ken: "I'm still here... You haven't killed me yet"
Bart: "That's true... I guess it must mean you're special too"

Ken: "Bart, wait!"
Bart: "I'm sick of hanging around like a coconut, you're slowing me down. All this sleeping and eating stuff distracts you from what you gotta get done."
Ken: "What.. what.. where are you... what are you doing?!"
Bart: "See?" 
Ken: "Wait, what are you doing?"
Bart: "I'm gonna kill that guy."
Ken: "That's Dirk Gently?"
Bart: "I dunno Ken, let's kill him and find out." 
Ken: "Wait, what?"
Bart: "I thought we got over this."
Ken: "This is not like Red and the bikers, you can't just kill some guy in broad daylight in the middle of a crowded street!" 
Bart: "It's what I do Ken. It's all I do, it's the will of the Universe."
Ken: "I know, I know. Ok, but you don't want to end up in jail right? I mean how are you going to fulfil your mission to kill Dirk Gently if you're locked up in a cell?" 
Bart: "Maybe that's where Dirk Gently is."
Ken: "In a woman's prison?!" 
Bart: "... You talk too much."
